title: Simple <select onChange> function wouldn't work in IE but works on any other browser
body:
https://codepen.io/anon/pen/owpWgY

Very simple function, everything is static and the IDs are known in advance, works perfectly fine in Chrome but for whatever reason wouldn't change the Style when run in IE (11)

function change(dd){

  if (dd.value == "0") {

      document.getElementById("id1").style = "";
      document.getElementById("id2").style = "display:none";
    }
    else {
      document.getElementById("id2").style = "";
      document.getElementById("id1").style = "display:none";
    }

}
